name: Wrath of The Vampire Queen Episode 1: Blood Moon Curse
name_original: Wrath of The Vampire Queen Episode 1: Blood Moon Curse
description: Wrath of the vampire Queen takes place in corrupted timelines in which something in the original timeline goes right by this we mean if Eva dies then a corrupted timeline is born and in which Eva lives and stuff goes wrong from there in the corrupted timeline but nothing good happens in the corrupted timeline.  This Episode takes place in the final moments of Episode 4 of the original timeline.   In this Episode u are an Unnamed Civilian who one day finds himself caught in the middle of Eva's Wrath upon the earth,  Releasing  Demons.Zombies, Etc on Earth. The Objective of this series is figuring out what's going on and try to stop the apocalypse That Eva has started. You also need to figure out how to stop Eva and once and for all close the corrupted timeline and seal it off from the rest of the world so it doesn't spread to the rest of the timelines and universes.
